item.description:
The purpose of this event is to socialize and donate a book to Cradles to Crayons (an organization that donates to underprivileged children).

For $10 you get any beverage of your choice (choose from coffee, tea, cappuccino, frappuccino, smoothies, lattes and more...) you get to choose a book that gets donated to an underprivileged child as a holiday gift.

We will have a reserved section to sit and socialize and the books that you get to choose from will be displayed in the cafe.

Event time is 2 pm - 4 pm

If you sign up and cannot make it, let us know and we will pick a book to be donated for you.

If you do not drink coffee or tea, the Cafe offers lots of other great drinks from smoothies to sparkling waters and soft drinks.

Â 

Special opportunity for Teachers!
It just so happens that it is Teacher's Appreciation Day this day. If you are a teacher, you get 25% off of almost anything in the store. If you do not have a Teachers' Discount Card you can get one for free when you arrive. Or get one at any Barnes & Noble store prior to the event.

Attention Beer Lovers! Book Signing by Norman Miller
In addition to a fun afternoon of socializing and donating books, there will also be a book signing with Norman Miller, author of BEER LOVER'S - Best Breweries, Brewpubs and Beer Bars of New England"
item.name: Coffee, Tea, Lattes, Donate a Book & Socialize
